column1: Art Institute of Chicago////These are some of his earlier works. Already developed were many of his most important themes of "hiding in plain sight" and illogical compositional elements
column2: windowpane presentation and wordplay. Not included in this exhibit are a lot of bowler hats and green apples which are a big part of his total lexicon. But no matter
column3: the exhibit is phenomenal. I plan to visit again before its done in October.
